00041 ostream* os_ = 0;

00044 void initializeWithTestData(FrequencyData& fd)
00045 {
00046     for (TestDatum* datum=testData_; datum<testData_+testDataSize_; datum++)
00047         fd.data().push_back(FrequencyDatum(datum->frequency, 
00048             complex<double>(datum->real, datum->imaginary))); 
00049 
00050     fd.observationDuration(testDataObservationDuration_);
00051     fd.calibrationParameters(CalibrationParameters(testDataCalibrationA_, testDataCalibrationB_));
00052     fd.analyze();
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 void testCreation(const IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator& isotopeEnvelopeEstimator)
00057 {
00058     if (os_) *os_ << "testCreation()\n";
00059     const int filterMatchRate = 4;
00060     const int filterSampleRadius = 2;
00061     const double peakThresholdFactor = 0;
00062     const double peakMaxCorrelationAngle = 5;
00063     const double isotopeThresholdFactor = 666;
00064     const double monoisotopicPeakThresholdFactor = 777;
00065 
00066     PeakDetectorMatchedFilter::Config config;
00067     config.isotopeEnvelopeEstimator = &isotopeEnvelopeEstimator; 
00068     config.filterMatchRate = filterMatchRate;
00069     config.filterSampleRadius = filterSampleRadius;
00070     config.peakThresholdFactor = peakThresholdFactor;
00071     config.peakMaxCorrelationAngle = peakMaxCorrelationAngle;
00072     config.isotopeThresholdFactor = isotopeThresholdFactor;
00073     config.monoisotopicPeakThresholdFactor = monoisotopicPeakThresholdFactor;
00074 
00075     auto_ptr<PeakDetectorMatchedFilter> pd = PeakDetectorMatchedFilter::create(config);
00076 
00077     unit_assert(pd->config().filterMatchRate == filterMatchRate); 
00078     unit_assert(pd->config().filterSampleRadius == filterSampleRadius); 
00079     unit_assert(pd->config().peakThresholdFactor == peakThresholdFactor); 
00080     unit_assert(pd->config().peakMaxCorrelationAngle == peakMaxCorrelationAngle); 
00081     unit_assert(pd->config().isotopeThresholdFactor == isotopeThresholdFactor); 
00082     unit_assert(pd->config().monoisotopicPeakThresholdFactor == monoisotopicPeakThresholdFactor); 
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 void testFind(FrequencyData& fd, const IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator& isotopeEnvelopeEstimator)
00087 {
00088     if (os_) *os_ << "testFind()\n";
00089 
00090     // fill in config structure
00091     PeakDetectorMatchedFilter::Config config;
00092     config.isotopeEnvelopeEstimator = &isotopeEnvelopeEstimator; 
00093     config.filterMatchRate = 4;
00094     config.filterSampleRadius = 2;
00095     config.peakThresholdFactor = 2;
00096     config.peakMaxCorrelationAngle = 30;
00097     config.isotopeThresholdFactor = 2;
00098     config.monoisotopicPeakThresholdFactor = 2;
00099     config.isotopeMaxChargeState = 6;
00100     config.isotopeMaxNeutronCount = 4;
00101     config.collapseRadius = 15;
00102     config.useMagnitudeFilter = false;
00103     config.logDetailLevel = 1;
00104     config.log = os_;
00105 
00106     // instantiate
00107     auto_ptr<PeakDetectorMatchedFilter> pd = PeakDetectorMatchedFilter::create(config);
00108 
00109     // find peaks
00110     PeakData data;
00111     data.scans.push_back(Scan());
00112     vector<PeakDetectorMatchedFilter::Score> scores;
00113     pd->findPeaks(fd, data.scans[0], scores);
00114 
00115     // report results
00116     if (os_) 
00117     {
00118         *os_ << "peaks found: " << data.scans[0].peakFamilies.size() << endl;
00119         data.scans[0].printSimple(*os_);
00120         *os_ << "scores: " << scores.size() << endl;
00121         copy(scores.begin(), scores.end(),
00122             ostream_iterator<PeakDetectorMatchedFilter::Score>(*os_, "\n"));
00123     }
00124 
00125     // assertions
00126     unit_assert(data.scans[0].peakFamilies.size() == 1);
00127     const PeakFamily& peakFamily = data.scans[0].peakFamilies.back(); 
00128     
00129     if (os_) *os_ << "peakFamily: " << peakFamily << endl;
00130     unit_assert(peakFamily.peaks.size() > 1);
00131     const Peak& peak = peakFamily.peaks[0];
00132     unit_assert_equal(peak.frequency, 159455, 1);
00133     unit_assert(peakFamily.charge == 2);
00134     
00135     unit_assert(scores.size() == 1);
00136     const PeakDetectorMatchedFilter::Score& score = scores.back();
00137     unit_assert(score.charge == peakFamily.charge);
00138     unit_assert(score.monoisotopicFrequency == peak.frequency);
00139     unit_assert_equal(norm(score.monoisotopicIntensity - polar(peak.intensity, peak.phase)),
00140                       0, 1e-14);
00141 }

00143 
00144 auto_ptr<IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator> createIsotopeEnvelopeEstimator()
00145 {
00146     const double abundanceCutoff = .01;
00147     const double massPrecision = .1; 
00148     IsotopeCalculator isotopeCalculator(abundanceCutoff, massPrecision);
00149 
00150     IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator::Config config;
00151     config.isotopeCalculator = &isotopeCalculator;
00152 
00153     return auto_ptr<IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator>(new IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator(config));
00154 }
00155 
00156 
00157 void test()
00158 {
00159     if (os_) *os_ << setprecision(12);
00160 
00161     auto_ptr<IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator> isotopeEnvelopeEstimator = createIsotopeEnvelopeEstimator();
00162 
00163     testCreation(*isotopeEnvelopeEstimator);
00164 
00165     FrequencyData fd;
00166     initializeWithTestData(fd);
00167 
00168     testFind(fd, *isotopeEnvelopeEstimator);
00169 }

00172 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00173 {
00174     try
00175     {
00176         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00177         if (os_) *os_ << "PeakDetectorMatchedFilterTest\n";
00178         test();
00179         return 0;
00180     }
00181     catch (exception& e)
00182     {
00183         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00184         return 1;
00185     }
00186 }
